snippet: Activists say at least 200 people were killed and hundreds more wounded in the Syrian city of Homs amid a barrage of mortar shells and heavy machine gun fire that began Friday night.
abstract: Activists say at least 200 people were killed and hundreds more wounded in the Syrian city of Homs amid a barrage of mortar shells and heavy machine gun fire that began Friday night.
lead_paragraph: As my colleague Joan Nassivera reports, activists say at least 200 people were killed and hundreds more wounded in the Syrian city of Homs amid a barrage of mortar shells and heavy machine gun fire that began Friday night.

headline.main: Scenes of Violence in Syria Ahead of U.N. Vote

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
